title: Senate Democrat says FBI nominee Kash Patel may have perjured himself
shortDescription: A key Senate Democrat said FBI nominee Kash Patel 'may have committed perjury' about a staff purge, but a spokesperson called it 'second-hand gossip.'

title: Pope Francis criticizes Trump's immigration policies in open letter
shortDescription: Pope Francis warned that President Donald Trump’s immigration policies “will end badly.”

title: President Trump questions judicial oversight
shortDescription: President Donald Trump’s pushback against the judiciary could change the how executive power functions.

title: No, Trump didn’t post about a ‘fork and spoon’ hybrid | Fact check
shortDescription: The post in the image is a fabrication. It doesn’t appear on Trump’s Truth Social account, and there are no credible news reports he made such a post.

title: Criminal classified documents case dismissed against Trump associates
shortDescription: A federal appeals court dismissed criminal charges against two Trump associates accused of helping him mishandle classified documents.

title: Mace accuses ex-fiancé and associates of rape in speech on House floor
shortDescription: Nancy Mace's former fiancé, Patrick Bryant, "categorically" denied the allegations to the South Carolina Daily Gazette newspaper.

title: Low flow no more? Trump to roll back rules on toilets, showers.
shortDescription: High flow toilets and incandescent light bulbs could make comebacks as President Donald Trump announced a rollback of regulations.

title: Judge orders CDC to restore webpages removed under Trump order
shortDescription: A judge ordered federal health agencies to restore webpages about medical treatments that were removed under a Trump administration order.

title: Trump wants Israel to end ceasefire if hostages aren't freed by Saturday
shortDescription: Plus: Why a group of states sued over billions in research cuts. | A judge extended the pause on a deadline for federal workers to decide on buyouts.

title: Trump plans big missile defense. Will it make America safer?
shortDescription: Space-based interceptors and "particle beams" are part of a new multi-billion-dollar Trump order to build a new U.S. missile defense system.

title: Trump trusts Musk: 5 takeaways from the Super Bowl interview
shortDescription: President Donald Trump exuded confidence during his Super Bowl interview as the 2.0 administration sink its teeth into Washington

title: Trump pauses enforcement of bribery laws for US firms overseas
shortDescription: The President says his new executive order was needed because the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act puts US firms at a competitive disadvantage overseas
